mapper.insert: insert into user_preference (ID, RETAIN_SUBJECT_STAGE, RETAIN_EXERCISE_TYPE, RETAIN_CHECK_INFO, AUTO_BACKGROUND_PICTURE, USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{retainSubjectStage,jdbcType=BIT}, #{retainExerciseType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{retainCheckInfo,jdbcType=BIT}, #{autoBackgroundPicture,jdbcType=BIT}, #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user_preference set RETAIN_SUBJECT_STAGE = #{retainSubjectStage,jdbcType=BIT}, RETAIN_EXERCISE_TYPE = #{retainExerciseType,jdbcType=BIT}, RETAIN_CHECK_INFO = #{retainCheckInfo,jdbcType=BIT}, AUTO_BACKGROUND_PICTURE = #{autoBackgroundPicture,jdbcType=BIT}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, RETAIN_SUBJECT_STAGE, RETAIN_EXERCISE_TYPE, RETAIN_CHECK_INFO, AUTO_BACKGROUND_PICTURE, USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from user_preference where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, RETAIN_SUBJECT_STAGE, RETAIN_EXERCISE_TYPE, RETAIN_CHECK_INFO, AUTO_BACKGROUND_PICTURE, USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from user_preference
